overview: An age old feud between rival New York pizza-makers Frank Bianco and Vito Rossi  re-ignites when young Angela Rossi decides to help her father put the Biancos out of business once and for all. But when young Tony Bianco agrees to help his father steal the secret to the Rossi's sauce, things really heat up.
tagline: ALL'S FAIR IN LOVE AND PIZZA
title: A Tale of Two Pizzas
